links.recoverPrompt: Lost access to the second factor?

mfa.invalidSessionBody: We did not receive a valid session identifier. Return to the <link>login screen</link> to restart the flow.

errors.missingCode: Provide the authenticator or recovery code.
errors.unexpected: We were unable to validate MFA.

success.confirmed: MFA confirmed successfully. You can continue.

recover.generateCardDescription: Produces a new set of recovery codes with immediate validity.
recover.completeCardDescription: Use one of the issued codes to create an authenticated session.

errors.missingEmail: Provide the email associated with the agent.

feedback.generatedAt: Store these codes safely. Issued at {{issuedAt}}.
feedback.completeSuccess: Recovery completed. <link>Return to login</link> to start a new session.

errors.offline: Offline mode enabled. Real-time data will sync when the connection returns.
errors.fetchUnavailable: Housekeeping service unavailable. Try again shortly.

errors.slaOffline: SLA monitoring is not available in offline mode.
errors.slaUnavailable: Unable to refresh partner SLAs. Service unavailable.

errors.mutationFailed: Unable to update the task in core.
errors.mutationUnexpected: An error occurred while updating the task.

connection.title: Connection status
connection.description: Monitor pending tasks and scheduled syncs.
connection.offline: Offline mode enabled. Completed tasks will sync automatically once connectivity is restored.
connection.online: Online. Automatic sync every 2 minutes plus manual sync available.

loading.title: Syncing tasks
loading.body: Loading data from the core service...

loadingError.body: Check connectivity or try again shortly.

empty.title: No tasks visible
empty.description: No housekeeping tasks found for the requested period.
empty.body: Adjust API filters to retrieve a different result set.

sla.errorDescription: Check with the integrations team to confirm the connection state.
sla.emptyDescription: No active SLA is associated with housekeeping partners.
sla.emptyBody: Update partner records to display alerts in this panel.

queue.offline: Offline mode enabled. Submissions will resume automatically.
queue.online: Online. No blockers to sync changes.

metrics.loadingBody: Refreshing indicators with the most recent data...
